clues.text: This lady richly deserves her pedestal; the first ticker-tape parade was held for her 1886 dedication

(Before the clue is given, Tony Award-nominated actress Carolee Carmello from the Broadway playMamma Mia!helps with the clue.)"Ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh  /You can dance /You can jive /Having the time of your life /Ooh-ooh-ooh, see that girl /Watch that scene /Dig in the dancing queen /""Dancing Queen" is one of many hit songs in "Mamma Mia!" that were originally made famous by this Swedish group
